content.text:
On The Occasion of Jeffrey Epstein's 50th Birthday

A Y.F.P.C.* is something to be
A V.F.P.C. is something to see
A Liver, a Lover, a Jeff, a Jeffrey
Let's all give a cheer for today he's Fifty!

Five decades, 1, or half century
By Birds and by Bucks, C's and M's are his key
Blonde, Red or Brunette, spread out geographically
With this net of fish, Jeff's now 'The Old Man and The Sea'

Teaching math, trading options or foreign currency
Green eyeshades, schemes and plans, a unique tax strategy
Wet dream and cauchemar, an architect's wild spree
Moscow, Paris, Santa Fe, Alhambra East jamboree
content.description: Handwritten birthday poem with multiple verses

text_sections.full_transcription:
On The Occasion of Jeffrey Epstein's 50th Birthday

A Y.F.P.C.* is something to be
A V.F.P.C. is something to see
A Liver, a Lover, a Jeff, a Jeffrey
Let's all give a cheer for today he's Fifty!

Five decades, 1, or half century
By Birds and by Bucks, C's and M's are his key
Blonde, Red or Brunette, spread out geographically
With this net of fish, Jeff's now 'The Old Man and The Sea'

Teaching math, trading options or foreign currency
Green eyeshades, schemes and plans, a unique tax strategy
Wet dream and cauchemar, an architect's wild spree
Moscow, Paris, Santa Fe, Alhambra East jamboree

insights: References teaching math - confirms Dalton School history
Mentions trading options and foreign currency - financial activities
'Unique tax strategy' suggests complex financial arrangements
'Green eyeshades, schemes and plans' implies financial plotting
'Blonde, Red or Brunette, spread out geographically' refers to women
'Net of fish' and 'Old Man and The Sea' metaphor for multiple women
International locations: Moscow, Paris, Santa Fe, Alhambra East
'Alhambra East jamboree' likely refers to property or event location
Coded acronyms Y.F.P.C. and V.F.P.C. suggest insider terminology
'Birds and Bucks' possibly code for women and money
'C's and M's are his key' likely coded reference to specific metrics
'Wet dream and cauchemar' (nightmare in French) suggests duality
'Architect's wild spree' may reference property development
Writer has intimate knowledge of Epstein's activities and history
Poem structure suggests educated, literate social circle
forensic_notes: Handwritten poem titled 'On The Occasion of Jeffrey Epstein's 50th Birthday'
Y.F.P.C. and V.F.P.C. - unexplained acronyms with asterisk
'A Liver, a Lover, a Jeff, a Jeffrey' - wordplay on name
'Birds and by Bucks, C's and M's are his key' - coded references
'Blonde, Red or Brunette, spread out geographically' - references to women
'The Old Man and The Sea' literary reference
Career references: 'Teaching math, trading options or foreign currency'
'Green eyeshades, schemes and plans, a unique tax strategy'
'Wet dream and cauchemar' - cauchemar is French for nightmare
'an architect's wild spree' - property development reference
Locations: Moscow, Paris, Santa Fe, Alhambra East jamboree
Written in black ink on white paper
